title: Server Problems???
body: Today, I disconnected form League 3 times in 3 separate games. It always starts with me moving , stopping, the game spiking to 500 ping, and then me being forced to both exit the game and close the client. Its not a problem with my internet, as I checked it before the game started to make sure nothing was slowing it down.  Is there anything I can do to fix it???

replies.body:
That sounds like a specific type of connection problem called packet loss. Essentially, part of that connection could be getting corrupted or lost before it travels to our servers and back to your network which can cause all kinds of freezing and stuff like champions 'teleporting' around. I wanna test for this really quick before we start troubleshooting in the wrong way.

Grab a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1. Paste the results here so I can take a look and see what's up.
